about_the_game:
The Blessed Fool is a profound point-and-click adventure where you are not only tasked with saving the townsfolk but also delving into the depths of human mystery to uncover who spreads terror in this eerie city. Your journey will take you through foul-smelling streets, crumbling homes, overcrowded cemeteries, libraries, and ominous monasteries. You'll help people whose lives are bound by shared fear and hope to unravel the mystery that has shrouded the entire town.

Features:

  • A deep narrative offering numerous interpretations of events and their hidden meanings.

  • Unique characters, including disabled individuals, soldiers, madmen, holy fools, bell ringers, and monks — each living in a world of suffering, fear, and violence.

  • A unique soundtrack that intensifies the experience.

  • A living city with its own history, traditions, craftsmanship, and faith.

  • Be warned: the game will challenge not only your logic but also your inner peace — immersing you in an atmosphere of pressure, anxiety, and stress, as though it becomes your adversary.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM

short_description: The blessed fool arrives in a strange city consumed by fear and violence to save its people from a new regime. But do they even want to be saved? Immerse yourself in a world where every step is a challenge, testing your fears and the limits of your endurance.
